Text:
@kadz It's very simple.
Create folder "db" inside FIFA 12/Game/data/
Then copy there "db_ng_db"
You should then regenerate FIFA 12 with iard86 Regenerator.
Download it from here: http://downloads.moddingway.com/file/17418.html
And thats all.
Its all working fine for me.
1.27mb? Im not an expert in these things so forgive me if this is legit but surely a transfer update would be much bigger?

@kadz im also playing with reloaded version
You must find fifa 12 folder when regenerator ask you,and just click on GO
All I get when I start the regenerator is that it only support the NG version
works great for me even withought the regenerator cause i have the reloaded version !! thanks

This isnt the official EA winter transfer patch, it a user edit db from the game, the official one wont be given away by someone just like that. I already have it including other patches get it from soccergaming.com or its forum alter.
I click and click on get this torrent, but doesnt works for me anymore :S
